room temperature consists of a main emission peak and a weak

emission peaks located at 505 and 580 nm, whose intensities
are close. This indicates that two kinds of Eu
peaks are located at 500 and 580 nm. According to Van Uitert
theory, we can assume that the 5d orbital energy level of the
ion in the same material is mainly aﬀected by the
surrounding atom coordination number. In the BASO:Eu
ion has only two coordination numbers (8
and 9). Thus, two diﬀerent emission wavelengths can possibly
be produced. For this purpose, we analyze the luminescence
